https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tPkY6zc2pD8Phds8BbFa3XOqafl.jpg After experiencing failure in business and his marriage, Mitsutoshi Yashiro (Shinsuke Kato) walks around looking for a place to die. He decides to stop at a red light district shop to have sex for one last time. He meets Hina (Rina Fujisaki) who changes his life. - AsianWiki A Helpless Love Song
